response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds significant value for us at $15,000. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. Considering its true worth and the opportunity it presents, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $12,000. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive a fantastic deal while also maximizing the return on our investment. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate this transaction. Kind regards, Alice.", "product_price": 12000}
